name: My Password Machine
body:
### Introducing My Password Machine, a better way to manage your passwords. 

My Password Machine creates a strong, unique password for every website. You won't need to remember those passwords or write them down. 

My Password Machine doesn't write down your passwords either! It just re-generates them on demand. That way there's no list of stored passwords for bad guys to steal.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
